entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
